price: 16. Markuu Rabbigi (Alle) uga dhawaaqay togga barakeysan ee Duwa.
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
